text: how to print number with commas as thousands separators in Python 2.x
I am trying to print an integer in Python 2.6.1 with commas as thousands separators.
For example, I want to show the number 1234567 as "1,234,567".
How would I go about doing this?
I have seen many examples on Google, but I am looking for the simplest practical way.
It does not need to be locale-specific to decide between periods and commas.
I would prefer something as simple as reasonably possible.
